00038 /* Cache system for movie data - now supports stoting ImBufs only
00039  * Supposed to provide unified cache system for movie clips, sequencer and
00040  * other movie-related areas */
00041 
00042 struct ImBuf;
00043 struct MovieCache;
00044 
00045 typedef void (*MovieCacheGetKeyDataFP) (void *userkey, int *framenr, int *proxy, int *render_flags);
00046

00048 void IMB_moviecache_destruct(void);

00053 void IMB_moviecache_free(struct MovieCache *cache);
